info.cautionDescription: If you book a place at the Integration Weekend (WEI), please bring two €100 deposit checks payable to « <payable>AEECL - WEI</payable> ».
info.cautionInstructions: On the back of the first write: "First name Last name - WEI 2025 - bus" and on the back of the second: "First name Last name - WEI 2025 - site". These deposit checks will only be cashed in the event of damage to the buses or the WEI site.
info.cdrOnsiteDescription: You'll be able to meet associations, express your interest for offered activities and ask any questions you may have.
info.cdrOnsiteMandatoryWarning: In the event of a major unavailability, please contact the Student Council (BDE) as soon as possible to find an alternative solution:
info.cdrOnsiteSubtitle: Following this online Chaîne de Rentrée, you will be called in the onsite Chaîne de Rentrée: your presence at the onsite Chaîne de Rentrée is mandatory to validate your purchases.
info.element: A Matrix instance is hosted on campus. This will enable you to communicate easily with other students in a secure, end-to-end encrypted way. To access it :
info.elementStep1: Download Element-x application on your phone
info.elementStep2: On the application choose "Change account provider" ("Changer de fournisseur de compte") then "Continue" ("Continuer")
info.elementStep4: You can then log in with your MyECL account
info.facebook: The majority of the campus' communication takes place via Facebook groups. New students can join the group 'Nouveaux Admis 2025' to make sure they don't miss any information:
info.myECL: The MyECL application is essential to student life at Centrale, it is mandatory to pay during numerous events (especially at the bar) and it will allow you to access plenty of services (the events calendar, the schedule of the film club, room reservations, and so forth).

introCarouselItem.contact: If you have any problems or questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Student Council (Bureau Des Élèves):
introCarouselItem.description: This site allows you to join to associations (student clubs), pay the handouts of lessons and take your ticket for the orientation weekend (WEI). This will save you precious time during the second part of the Chaîne de Rentrée which will take place in face-to-face. At the end of the process, you will be brought to pay online by credit card.
introCarouselItem.selectCurriculum: To start, please select your curriculum:
introCarouselItem.welcome: Welcome to École Centrale de Lyon's associative Chaîne De Rentrée.

login.contact: If you have any problems or questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Student Council (Bureau Des Élèves):
login.description: Welcome to École Centrale de Lyon's associative Chaîne De Rentrée. This site, designed for new, current and gap-year students, will allow you to join associations and subscribe to the school's associative services.
login.title: Chaîne de rentrée {year}

metadata.description: Centrale Lyon associative Back-to-School management platform
metadata.title: Associative Back-to-school

paymentButton.description: You will be redirected to HelloAsso to proceed to payment. HelloAsso is a French company offering payment solutions for associations. It is financed exclusively by donations. By default, HelloAsso will propose you to make a donation (called 'contribution volontaire' or 'voluntary contribution'), you can refuse to do so without compromising the payment. If you choose to make a donation, only HelloAsso will benefit it.
paymentButton.title: Information about the payment provider

productAccordion.membershipAlreadyTaken: You have already taken the membership to {membership} until {date}
